message: Let's start with a fair 50/50 split, Bob.
I think I deserve a bit more, 60/40 is more fair.
The value is decreasing Bob, let's settle for 55/45.
I'll meet you halfway between our last offers, but keep in mind the value is dropping.
This is getting ridiculous Bob, the longer we wait the less your share is worth.  Take the 40% while you can still get it!
